issue.title: Fix #448 install-cli fails

repository.name: vagrant-service-manager
repository.description: To provide the user a CLI to configure the ADB/CDK for different use cases and to provide glue between ADB/CDK and the user's developer environment.

issue.body:
Fix #448 

I suspect due to change in [vagrant 1.9.1 for winrm communicator](https://github.com/mitchellh/vagrant/commit/725824e1dd3c2225a6274df074142621751bfb14) we are having issues with Windows OS here.

body: Is this an issue with Windows specifically, or other host/guest combinations as well?

@chrisroberts ,

I am facing it in Windows and Linux (didn't have Mac). Seems to be some api change post 1.8.1 version.

I'm running into this issue right now with the CDK image running on Mac OSX Yosemite, and VirtualBox 5.1
Is there a way I can downgrade my vagrant to 1.8.1 to get this working?

_BDS00818:rhel-ose jsheppard$ vagrant service-manager install-cli openshift
undefined method `upcase' for nil:NilClass_
@shepp67 You can downgrade the version by uninstalling vagrant 1.9.1 and download older version of vagrant from here https://releases.hashicorp.com/vagrant/

issue.body:
$ vagrant service-manager install-cli openshift
undefined method `upcase' for nil:NilClass

vagrant-service-manager is at version 1.4.1.

body: Ty, giving that a go today!

issue.title: communicator/ssh: Do not pass empty data to registered blocks

repository.name: vagrant
repository.description: Vagrant is a tool for building and distributing development environments.

issue.body:
Prevent sending empty data strings to defined blocks handling
stderr and stdout output. These can occur when the garbage
marker is identified and collected data pruned, but no remaining
data is left to send.

Fixes #8259

body:
I'm going to lock this issue because it has been closed for _30 days_ â³. This helps our maintainers find and focus on the active issues.

If you have found a problem that seems similar to this, please open a new issue and complete the issue template so we can capture all the details necessary to investigate further.
